gloss: a unit of perceived loudness equal to the loudness of a 1000-hertz tone at 40 dB above threshold / the difference in pitch between two notes / the sound made by the vibration of vocal folds modified by the resonance of the vocal tract
the difference in pitch between two notes

a unit of perceived loudness equal to the loudness of a 1000-hertz tone at 40 dB above threshold / an inadvertent interruption in a broadcast during which there is no sound / quality or fidelity of a received broadcast
